root: ^Prodigy, please, I can't let you go through that portal. It's too dangerous. You'll die for sure.
^I have to prove myself, Annika. To the village, to everyone who thinks I'm nothing but a loser. If I don't do this, I'll never be worthy of you.
^Prodigy, you don't have anything to prove to anyone. You're already worth it, just the way you are. I can't bear the thought of losing you.
^Annika, I need to take this opportunity. It's my chance to change my fate, to prove that I'm capable of something great. I can't let it pass me by.
^I understand, but I can't suppress this feeling of dread. What if something terrible happens to you? I don't want to lose you.
^I promise, Annika, that I will do my best to come back to you, to prove that you were right all along. But right now, I have to believe in myself, even if it means taking a risk.
^I can't stop you. But before you go, there's something I want to give you.
^A stranger gave it to me not so long ago. He claimed it would bring luck with it. I hope it brings you back home safely.
^Thank you, Annika. I will cherish this book and keep it close to my heart.
^Please, Prodigy, remember that you're never alone. I'll be waiting for you, praying for your safe return.
^I couldn't ask for a better person to come home to. You've always seen the best in me, even when no one else did. Farewell.
